item.description:
• Come. Play. Have fun.

  • Pls note your level in your profile (so that we can match up more evenly). For player ratings, see: http://tennis.meetup.... .

  • If you can't get a court at Tufts, just grab a meetup partner or two and head to Dilboy Park (back up courts, 1mi away, at 320 Alewife Brook Pkwy, Somerville MA 02144; 2 courts available) or to Dugger Park (1.7mi away, at Mystic River Rd & Fairfield St., Medford MA 02155; 5 courts). Bring your GPS.

  • Pls note: meeting time changed to 1:30pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask, are you with meetup?
item.name: Tennis - Sunday afternoon
